name: The signet of shorn skies
data: It increases the users wisdom adequately.
It increases the users intelligence pathetically.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration a good amount.
It gives small bonus to the spell 'summon storm'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives decent bonus to the spell 'skyfire'.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'air lore'.
The signet can be 'rotated' to open up the clouds in the sky.
